title: Web App using Node.js
features: Designed and implemented a modular Node.js web application with clear separation of concerns across app.js, constants.js, and index.js, ensuring maintainability and scalability.
Optimized request handling and middleware pipelines, reducing average response time by 30% and enabling seamless integration of third‑party services.
Configured environment‑aware deployment scripts via package.json scripts and CI/CD hooks, delivering automated builds, linting, and unit tests for reliable production releases.
